meaning: if a room, building etc can accommodate a particular number of people or things, it has enough space for them
something that seems similar between two situations, processes etc
to expect that something will happen and be ready for it
to tell someone that something will definitely happen or is definitely true so that they are less worried
to succeed in achieving something after trying for a long time
on behalf of somebody
a big mass or shape of something
to stop doing something or stop happening
if a piece of writing, set of ideas etc is coherent, it is easy to understand because it is clear and reasonable
to happen at the same time as something else, especially by chance
to begin or to start something
if two pieces of computer equipment or software are compatible, they can be used together, especially when they are made by different companies
existing or happening at the same time
to keep someone or something within the limits of a particular activity or subject
a serious argument about something that involves many people and continues for a long time
to have a conversation with someone
a machine or tool that does a special job
to use all or most of your time, effort etc in order to do something or help someone
to become or make something become smaller or less
to change the appearance, sound, or shape of something so that it is strange or unclear
